content: Can't finish the game because it freezes at the same spot over and over. Don't waste your money on this game until bugs are fixed.

For this kind of game it is good, even if the story is boring. Rather long, looks nice, many locations, map. A lot of puzzles. Actually too many puzzles for my taste. Some I couldn't solve, as I ccouldnt find the pieces. Skip button is fast though, so no problem.

I loved the Ravenhearst games on the pc, but this one won't even let me input a profile name. I was looking forward to playing it but I am very disappointed that I wasted my money on a game that doesn't even work.
Enjoyed the game. It is really long and puzzles are very good. Absolutely worth it.
Love MCF
Love this game, wish I could finish , I'm stuck at the Well of Souls , can't move forward.

I wish all the Ravenhearst games were on Android. This is one of my favorite dysfunctional families off all adventure games. For those who cannot comprehend Alistair's presence in the year 2015, he has been in a town stuck in a time vacuum for 500 years. They all have come into 2015 where the current Master Detective is investigating Ravenhearst at the behest of The Queen of England.
love all the mcf games
A bit disturbing, but interesting. I miss BF games.
Second time playing this game. Just as good as the first time! Awesome graphics and storyline. This is one of the best!
Longtime MCF fan across all forms of game play!! I'm soooo happy to see MCF come to Android! Yay!!!
Big Fish hidden object and adventures, never disappoint.
Love all ravenhearst games...
It was good needs to be longer i finished in3 days
not m cup of tea.
Paid
I really enjoyed this game the puzzle are great
Got stuck on the first puzzle screen, there is NO BACK BUTTON!!
enjoyable fun to play
Replaying this game in 2020, enjoying it once again, thank you.
Loved the progressive puzzles

Still no response from big fish about my refund and its been 7 working days now. This is rediculous as the game does not work at all! I'm so upset with how I have been ignored by such a big company yet when I had a similar issue with a small developer I got a refund in minutes of contact! Do not get this app on android unless you want dissapointment.
I already played this game but it was a good game the first time around
wont load all i get is a black screen.
excellent app

The game keeps glitching at the menu. I have tried turning off my phone then turning it back on. And the game still glitches. I am not sure if it's a bug on my phone because I have never had this problem until today when I downloaded this game. I played the demo version and didn't have this problem. But when I bought the full game it started glitching.
just a little bit too short but other than that it's a good game
Love ittt.

The worst and most annoying thing about this game is having to endure the 
barrage of Big Fish Games ads every time you want to play (even after 
you've paid for the full version). There's a reason I won't download any 
other games from this developer. But I'm addicted to Mystery Case Files, so 
I put up with the endless advertising so I can play these games. Fans will 
know what to expect: this game has the same great puzzles and creepy story. 
I thought the earlier games had a better storyline. And it would be hard to 
follow what's happening without playing the other games first, so if you 
haven't played the others, so back to the beginning and play the games in 
order.

Great game with interesting and challenging puzzles, longer than most with 
good storyline. I look forward to more.

Fun game, another good installment of the Ravenhearst series, although I'm not sure it's a favorite. But the HOPs and mini-games were challenging without being too difficult, good length, decent bonus content.
Great game graphics.
It is fun and challenging but worth the money.

This game is easy and too shorts. Love the series and its nostalgic for me. Make it can move to external storage because its space consuming. Why internal storage only?? Ill give u 5 star if u do that. Also when i pay premium full price THATS MEAN NO ADS!

This game didn't work for me because the screen didnt fit properly to my Galaxy Note 10.1 tablet. The inventory of useful objects was below my screen edge and couldn't be changed.  With Google you only have 1 hour after purchase in which to get a refund. I discovered this only a few minutes after that hour was up so liability passes to the developer - Big Fish Games.  They used to have great customer service in their early days but now you cannot email a human being to complain.
Do not like trying to find objects with a dime screen. Everything else is great. I'm handicapped and I have problems with that small of a screen.

You know that word that starts with 'F' and sounds like a quick movement to avoid a thrown object? Well, this game is that followed by the word that means ' shining really bright '. I just love the Ravenhurst series. ( mind you, I've only just got to the Security Room. No probs yet. Unfortunately, the other reviewers seem to have problems. I'll investigate on and let you know).

A lot less challenging than its forerunner. Too many "puzzles" were only about matching the right pairs of (not even hidden) symbols, which frankly a 3 year old can do..minigames were much easier OR sometimes so far-fetched you couldn't figure out what their point/logic was at all (and I have played most of the MCF games so I have a fair share to compare it with). One very annoying feature was the game not recognising when you pulled a correct item to its rightfully designed place of action. It threw me off the path in the beginning until I realised you just have to pull pull pull the item over and over again to where you wanted it to work until it finally did its job....In all, Key to Ravenhearst was a LOT better! Given the chance, I'd skip Ravenhearst Unlocked altogether.
Fantastic and very long!
The puzzles were a pain in the ass but fun trying to figure out.  I'm a Mystery Case Files Junkie so keep them coming!

Premise is over the top but if you have played all the Ravenhearst, you gotta do this one too. Fun to play nonetheless. Has map, lighthouses to find, master puzzles & good graphics. Played twice, which I never really do.
Strange
love love it
This is the best game.  I love it!!
Won't even let me create a profile so can't even start game!! I've uninstalled and reinstalled.......still the same!! Not happy at all!!

Another one that freezes near the end of the game. Uninstalling and reinstalling only works half of the time but its almost not worth it to have to go through all of the super puzzles again without skipping. Stinks.
Good game but no fix for freezing issue when using the ash shovel

Can't play because my tablets interface gets in the way.  The game does not go into full screen, so the bar at the bottom of my tablet covers half of the objects panel and hides the bottom half of the hidden objects.  Therefore, I have uninstalled and asked for a refund.  Thanks for nothing.

Can't finish the game because it freezes every time I try and open the drawer with the ash shovel!!! So frustrating! I will adjust my review accordingly if this bug is fixed. Until then I do not recommend purchase.
Could have neen a good one, but some mini games were too time consuming or didnt work at all. Good game if you like the hint and skip buttons.
love it
I have all of the chapters in this series, for my pc and portables.  Keep up the good work!
a very good game. let us have more ravenhurst games
OK....been done to death now...

It didnt keep freezing with the shovel. I can see its a common problem among users. Is this what we paid for? An incomplete game that we cant finish. Edit: getting more and more annoyed that this still is not fixed. If you are not going to fix it shouldnt you refund for the people who have paid for a game they cant even play
I like the plethora of mini games and the complexity of some of them, but the sensitivity of them and the HOGs kinda suck a lil bit.
asteeg
I like this game
What is the update and why isn't it already in the game I JUST installed???
As always....fantastic game...
Android status asoft icons are not autohiding anymore

What a great game.  All of the Ravenhearst games are wonderful and this is no exception.   I have enjoyed them all.  Not only are there the HOS's but you get some great puzzles to go along which are a bit more difficult but loads of fun.   I hope that this isn't the last of its kind.  I sure would hate to see these games go.  (Unless you have something new coming out soon.)

Game looks like it will be great. I am playing on a Samsung Galaxy tablet. The moment I hit play, my home screen buttons come up and stay there. For instance,  in the hidden object game you can't see the bottom line of objects that you need to collect.
Love all MCF games they just get better with each new game.  Keep them comming
This is a GREAT game
Disappointed ....like the game but it keeps just turning off
Great game, Loved the puzzles,storyline, graphics. Kept you wanting to play. Can't wait for more.

I wish it didn't feel like this is the end of the Ravenhearst series. This among the others in the series was a great game & certainly lived up to its potential. Worth the buy if you ask me but if you are new to this game, I would start from the 1st game to understand the background story. 👍👍
Bummer. I cannot get the emerald on the Priest's Terrace to finish the game. 5 stars if I can get past this point, so far it has been a great game.

This game is , by far, the best one I've ever either played or bought and played .The puzzles are beyond challenging as well as being quite original. I'm actually playing the new add on and it just gets better. Each puzzle reflects the storyline which doesn't always happen I know.
I see others have the same freeze problem with the ash shovel.  Obvious game bug that hasn't been fixed and no way to find a fix so I won't be able to finish. was a 5 up to that point.

Was very curious about this 'chapter' bc it's the second game developed by Eipix (taken over from Elephant). As a standalone game it is a good effort. They kept the super puzzles, length, partial soundtrack. Added the always interesting Eipix HOGs and souvenirs. But, as a continuation of the beloved MCF/Ravenhurst story it is terrible. Story is laughable, character design is silly, cut scenes incredibly blurry. Sad.
STILL NOT FIXED AFTER UPDATE PLEASE PLEASE FIX!!!  The game freezes and crashes out when I try to use the shovel of ash. Have had to reboot my phone a number of times please fix for 5 stars

I'm on the fence with this one. I thought the last installment was exceptional but there was something missing with this game. It had all that we gamer's look for but, I felt let down. The graphics were great and some of the puzzles were wild  but I just didn't care for the storyline. Somehow, I just felt let down considering how long this saga has been going on. I would recommend it though but if you're a newcomer to the series,  I suggest you try some of the earlier games to understand the story of Ravenhearst.
Another fine addition to the Raven Saga. If you haven't played the others in the series, I suggest that you find them.
Good game but the hunt feature bugs me! No specific hints - but it seems to be the case with all these MCF games. Would be better if the hints was more specific.
Finally quit crashing but still not thrilled with the game. Good map
I would give a 5 star i love the game but i was stuck up in the  priest terrace due to mask of the girl was missing no matter how i restart the game. Pls fix it . thanks
paid for it, but it wont download.......i just HATE to be ripped off!!!!!!!!!
Nearly flawless game for once. I see a resurgence in quality from Big Fish, hopefully. Play it on the most difficult setting, you'll enjoy it more.
Awsome game lots of adventure and mini games. Keep them coming well worth the money
Crashed. Made me start a scene over but would not allow me to make any moves. Hop scene was gone hint button wont work. Refund, refund, refund!!!
Excellent.  Make more like the last 2.

Very challenging, and fun.  I had to use the hints a few times, it was at times very tough and hard to see.  Over all very well done.  Please hurry and release new one.  There are not enough new games to keep me going.
Loved the beginning, even made me jump a  little.. but then it got boring,  I lost interest
Another nice chapter for the Master Detective. I hope you continue the story w more & different characters.
It will not let me write a profile name hence I can't access game full stop. Have already paid so not happy

I love all the Ravenhearst games...I actually stopped playing another game I was in the middle of when I saw this new one come out. Problem is, I've gotten so far through the game and now I'm at the part where I have to throw a tapestry on the fire...the game completely freezes as soon as I do that.  I've uninstalled and reinstalled the game and the same thing happens. I would be giving a 5 star rating if I were able to continue playing the game....needless to say, I'm very disappointed.

Good game, a lot of challenging puzzles.  The super puzzles were great.  However, there was something hinky in the super puzzle in the bonus game.  There was a slider puzzle that needed 3 components.  But, once you got those parts, the puzzle simply closed, so you could not solve that part.  Sorta disappointing.
Great game!!

Good game! The Mimi games were different & really had ya thinking. The bonus game was different which had u in a completely different character. The only complaint was that the controls were slow but it was worth it!
This game is a 10. All the bells and whistles. Lots of fun, long and really good extras.
Just will not open
I can't see my inventory or the list of items to find on the HOP puzzles...
Great game so far, glad to have a map
Can't really say as just started playing the game but so far no glitches no lagging and no freezing out definitely worth all the money and worth playing will update again in a while
Good
BEST RAVENHEARST YET ~~~
Excellent games
Played  better.
Well done Big Fish on another great game
Must Play!
